text:
Berlin, Germany / Ally / Door2Door GmbH / http://www.allyapp.com

Want to build a platform and apps for urban mobility?

The Ally team is growing and we are looking for colleagues in many areas, all experience levels.

For example, we are actively seeking for a colleague to join as:

* Lead Software Engineer, iOS

We do support VISA sponsorship for our ONSITE opportunities, including positions for INTERNS.

To apply or learn more about us: http://www.allyapp.com/team-jobs/
